long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Youtube always spoiling your favourite shows, a movie you're going to see, or maybe an event you're going to? Well no more! 

This blurs out any thumbnail and title you want!

Want to hide all videos from a content creator? Done!
Want to hide all videos relating to a topic? Done!
Want to hide all videos about a movie? Done!
